HOME_COMPANY_TEXT: Benson & Harley Pty Ltd is a trading company based in Queensland. We have years of experience in market development in ASEAN countries, especially Vietnam. We export and distribute products to our wholesalers and distributors in Vietnam and have in-house packaging capabilities. Our focus is exporting consumer goods and personal care products to those exponential growth markets. We earn trust and respect from our partners through our strong business ethics, reliable, efficient and effective ways of doing things.
HOME_CONTACT_SUBTITLE: Feel free to email us and we will get things moving.
